sentences.sContent: It was, for a brief time, a brisk stroll into the future.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was, for a brief time, a brisk stroll into the future.
sentences.sCn: 在一个短暂时间内，它是一次迈向未来的轻快漫步。

remMethod.val: st(看作street， 街道)+roll(转) → 在大街上转悠 → 闲逛

words.tran: 散步者；流浪者；（美）折叠式婴儿车；巡回演出的演员

trans.tranOther: to walk somewhere in a slow relaxed way
